description: This file contains Express middleware functions for validating incoming request data. It includes a generic validation middleware that checks request body, params, or query against a provided schema, and a specific middleware to validate route parameter ':id' as a positive integer.

methods.name: validate(schema, target = 'body')
methods.description: Middleware factory that validates request data against a schema; proceeds if valid, responds with 400 on validation errors, or 500 on exceptions.

methods.name: validateIdParam(paramName = 'id')
methods.description: Middleware that ensures route parameter ':id' (or specified param) is a positive integer; responds with 400 if invalid.
